flavor_text: 世界は未来を望んでいます
ability: 【C】 Your other Character in the Center slot of the Front Row gains 『【A】 ENCORE ［Place 1 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］』.
【C】 SUPPORT All your Characters in front of this card get +X Power. X is equals to that Character's Level ×500.

name: 未来へ託す ユーリ
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: まだ微かに希望があると、そう思えたので
ability: 【C】 During your turn, if you have other 「マナの才能 アラム」, this card gets +4000 Power.

【A】［Place 1 《マナ》 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the Cost. If you did, choose 1 「マナの才能 アラム」 from your Waiting Room, place it into any slot on Stage.

name: マナの才能 アラム
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: アルドラ！
ability: 【C】 During your turn, if you have other 「未来へ託す ユーリ」, this card gets +4000 Power.
【C】 For each of your other 《マナ》 Characters, this card gets +500 Power.

name: 義勇軍のユーリ
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: 諦めてたまるかァ！！
ability: 【C】 If this card is in the Front Row, all your 《マナ》 Characters get +1500 Power.

【A】【CXCOMBO】［①］ When this card attacks, if 「絆が見せる光」 is in the Climax slot, you may pay the Cost. If you did, during this turn, this card gets +1000 Power, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is Level 1 or lower, deal 1 Damage to your opponent. If it is not, deal 2 Damage to your opponent. (Climax is considered Level 0. Damage can be cancelled. Return revealed card to its original position)

name: 絆が見せる光
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: 光を掴む！
ability: 【A】 When this card is placed into Climax slot from Hand, choose up to 1 Red card from your Waiting Room, place it to Stock, during this turn, all your Characters get +1 Soul.

name: 白き閃光
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: 諦めるかよォ！！
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Gate：When this card is Triggered, you may choose 1 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand)

name: 聖王女の楯 ブルクハルト
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: 貴様、また私のマナを！
ability: 【C】 The Character facing this card cannot be moved to another slot.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gets +1500 Power.

name: 聖王女 ユリアナ
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: あなたが彼を導いてあげて
ability: 【C】 During your opponent's turn, if all your Characters are 《マナ》, this card gets +1 Level, +1500 Power.

name: 聖騎士団総帥 アインスロット
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: ユリアナ様のことを、頼んだぞ
ability: 【C】 During your opponent's turn, if all your Characters are 《マナ》, this card gets +2000 Power.
【A】 ENCORE ［Place 1 《マナ》 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ (When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay this Cost. If you do, place this card in its previous slot in REST)

name: 女騎士 ユリアナ
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
flavor_text: あたしだってやれるわ！
ability: 【C】 During your opponent's turn, if all your Characters are 《マナ》, this card gets +2000 Power.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may place the top card of your Clock into Waiting Room.

name: 運命は廻りはじめる…
expansion: Chain Chronicle: The Light of Haecceitas
ability: Reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《マナ》 Character, place it into any slot on Stage. (If not, return revealed card to its original position)

ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +2 Soul.
